metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14632 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Xiph.Org libvorbis 1.3.5 allows Remote Code Execution upon freeing uninitialized memory in the function vorbis_analysis_headerout() in info.c when vi->channels<=0, a similar issue to Mozilla bug 550184.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14632` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvorbis0a - 1.3.5-3ubuntu0.1
libvorbisenc2 - 1.3.5-3ubuntu0.1
libvorbisfile3 - 1.3.5-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvorbis package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.5-3ubuntu0.1').
